articles.author: Daniel Davis
articles.title: Sergio Ramos 'turned down Manchester City and a surprise offer from Arsenal' before joining PSG - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ramos departed Real Madrid after his contract was allowed to run down, and a host of elite clubs from across Europe unsurprisingly tried to snap up the free agent.
articles.content:
Paris Saint-Germain's newest big-name signing Sergio Ramos turned down offers from Arsenal and Manchester City this summer, according to reports.
Ramos departed Real Madrid after his contract was al… [+2844 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-England face disciplinary probe over laser pen shone at Schmeichel - The Star Online
articles.description: (Reuters) -     European football's governing body UEFA opened disciplinary proceedings against England on Thursday over a laser pen shone at Denmark goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel during the deciding moment of their Euro 2020 semi-final.

articles.title: EU: Fully vaccinated persons allowed entry in principle - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: Anyone who has received full doses of Covid-19 vaccines authorised by member countries are allowed entry, says the European Union (EU).
